mapper.select: select r.used_review_id, r.writer_id, r.content, r.regdate, m.storename as writer from used_review r, member m where r.writer_id=m.member_id and m.user_grade!=8 and r.member_id=#{member_id} order by r.used_review_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into used_review(member_id, writer_id, content) values(#{member_id}, #{writer_id}, #{content});
